title: Lucy Boynton And Rami Malek Outdressed Everyone For Their Date At The Politician's After Party
text:
From ELLE

Rami Malek and Lucy Boynton have established themselves over the last year as a fashion couple. Both wear the hell out of chic, couture clothes, and both like to match each other, especially during their public dates. Last night, they were at The Politician's after party at the Pool in New York City (Boynton plays Astrid in the series), and the two coordinated in black. Boynton wore a cream chiffon gown with grey and teal diamonds on it and a black tie at the neck.

Photo credit: Dimitrios Kambouris - Getty Images More

It's that black accent that tied her look together with Malek's. He was in a grey and white striped button-up with a black tie and black pants. Together, they were one of the best dressed couples at the party, if not the best:

Photo credit: Dimitrios Kambouris - Getty Images More

Boynton, by the way, recently talked about how she struggles with some fan girls' physical reactions to her boyfriend. (The two, who co-starred in Bohemian Rhapsody, were first reported to be dating in April 2018.) "It's lovely to see people who are excited about his work—if they've seen Mr. Robot or Freddie—but it's just that thing of people grabbing him." Boynton told Net-A-Porter's Porter in an interview released last week. "I mean, you'd never grab a complete stranger in the street. And I think there's a sense of ownership, [that] it's okay to just come up to someone, with your camera already out, and disregard whoever they're with. It happened when we were with my mother, and we were just shoved out of the way. It's quite shocking."
